rules.natural: If the facility requires legislation, then the facility has compliant production of drug1.
Provided that the facility requires legislation, the facility has exempt production for drug1.
Either the facility requires legislation or the facility generates profit.

Either the facility violates legislation or the facility is compliant with legislation.
Either drug1 has clinical trial success or drug1 has fast track approval.
